vocabinfos.mediumDef:
girdle, belt
Another spelling of ha.go.rah (חֲגוֹרָה "belt" H2290B)
§ girdle, belt
vocabinfos._es_Definition: una banda de cuero o tela usada alrededor de la cintura (exterior a la propia ropa): cinturón, faja
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition: 腰帶, 束腰, 遮胯間的布
vocabinfos._zh_Definition: 腰带, 束腰, 遮胯间的布

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
girdle, loin-covering, belt, loin-cloth, armour
Also means: cha.gor (חֲגוֹר "belt" H2290A)
§ girdle, loin-covering, belt, loin-cloth, armour
